verses.verse: Moreover the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> <S%H347>Job<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>,
Shall he that <S%H7378>contendeth<s%> with the <S%H7706>Almighty<s%> <S%H3250>instruct<s%> him? he that <S%H3198>reproveth<s%> <S%H433>God<s%>, let him <S%H6030>answer<s%> it.
Then <S%H347>Job<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>,
Behold, I am <S%H7043>vile<s%>; what shall I <S%H7725>answer<s%> thee? I will <S%H7760>lay<s%> mine <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H3926>upon<s%> my <S%H6310>mouth<s%>.
<S%H259>Once<s%> have I <S%H1696>spoken<s%>; but I will not <S%H6030>answer<s%>: yea, <S%H8147>twice<s%>; but I will proceed no <S%H3254>further<s%>.
Then <S%H6030>answered<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> unto <S%H347>Job<s%> out of the <S%H5591>whirlwind<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>,
Gird <S%H247>up<s%> thy <S%H2504>loins<s%> now like a <S%H1397>man<s%>: I will <S%H7592>demand<s%> of thee, and <S%H3045>declare<s%> thou unto me.
Wilt thou also <S%H6565>disannul<s%> my <S%H4941>judgment<s%>? wilt thou <S%H7561>condemn<s%> me, that thou mayest be <S%H6663>righteous<s%>?
Hast thou an <S%H2220>arm<s%> like <S%H410>God<s%>? or canst thou <S%H7481>thunder<s%> with a <S%H6963>voice<s%> like him?
<S%H5710>Deck<s%> thyself now with <S%H1347>majesty<s%> and <S%H1363>excellency<s%>; and <S%H3847>array<s%> thyself with <S%H1935>glory<s%> and <S%H1926>beauty<s%>.
Cast <S%H6327>abroad<s%> the <S%H5678>rage<s%> of thy <S%H639>wrath<s%>: and <S%H7200>behold<s%> every one that is <S%H1343>proud<s%>, and <S%H8213>abase<s%> him.
<S%H7200>Look<s%> on every one that is <S%H1343>proud<s%>, and bring him <S%H3665>low<s%>; and tread <S%H1915>down<s%> the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> in their place.
<S%H2934>Hide<s%> them in the <S%H6083>dust<s%> <S%H3162>together<s%>; and <S%H2280>bind<s%> their <S%H6440>faces<s%> in <S%H2934>secret<s%>.
Then will I also <S%H3034>confess<s%> unto thee that thine own right <S%H3225>hand<s%> can <S%H3467>save<s%> thee.
Behold now <S%H930>behemoth<s%>, which I <S%H6213>made<s%> with thee; he <S%H398>eateth<s%> <S%H2682>grass<s%> as an <S%H1241>ox<s%>. behemoth: or the Elephant as some think
Lo now, his <S%H3581>strength<s%> is in his <S%H4975>loins<s%>, and his <S%H202>force<s%> is in the <S%H8306>navel<s%> of his <S%H990>belly<s%>.
He <S%H2654>moveth<s%> his <S%H2180>tail<s%> like a <S%H730>cedar<s%>: the <S%H1517>sinews<s%> of his <S%H6344>stones<s%> are wrapped <S%H8276>together<s%>. He: or, He setteth up
His <S%H6106>bones<s%> are as <S%H650>strong<s%> pieces of <S%H5154>brass<s%>; his <S%H1634>bones<s%> are like <S%H4300>bars<s%> of <S%H1270>iron<s%>.
He is the <S%H7225>chief<s%> of the <S%H1870>ways<s%> of <S%H410>God<s%>: he that <S%H6213>made<s%> him can <S%H5066>make<s%> his <S%H2719>sword<s%> to <S%H5066>approach<s%> unto him.
Surely the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> bring him <S%H5375>forth<s%> <S%H944>food<s%>, where all the <S%H2416>beasts<s%> of the <S%H7704>field<s%> <S%H7832>play<s%>.
He <S%H7901>lieth<s%> under the shady <S%H6628>trees<s%>, in the <S%H5643>covert<s%> of the <S%H7070>reed<s%>, and <S%H1207>fens<s%>.
The shady <S%H6628>trees<s%> <S%H5526>cover<s%> him with their <S%H6752>shadow<s%>; the <S%H6155>willows<s%> of the <S%H5158>brook<s%> compass him <S%H5437>about<s%>.

Behold, he drinketh <S%H6231>up<s%> a <S%H5104>river<s%>, and <S%H2648>hasteth<s%> not: he <S%H982>trusteth<s%> that he can draw <S%H1518>up<s%> <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> into his <S%H6310>mouth<s%>. he drinketh up: Heb. he oppresseth
He <S%H3947>taketh<s%> it with his <S%H5869>eyes<s%>: his <S%H639>nose<s%> pierceth <S%H5344>through<s%> <S%H4170>snares<s%>. He: or, Will any take him in his sight, or, bore his nose with a gin?
